scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=studymate-client --branch=main
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=studymate-client --branch=preview
scripts.lighthouse: npm run build && npm run preview & lhci autorun
scripts.perf: npm run build && npm run analyze
scripts.test:e2e: vite build && vite preview --port 4173 --strictPort & PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://localhost:4173 playwright test && kill $!
scripts.test:e2e:ui: vite build && vite preview --port 4173 --strictPort & PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://localhost:4173 playwright test --ui && kill $!
scripts.test:e2e:debug: vite build && vite preview --port 4173 --strictPort & PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://localhost:4173 playwright test --debug && kill $!
